properties.author: David Dixon-Peugh
properties.title: Demo PMD on your Java Project!

section.name: Warning
section.p: This demo is not completed. Please do not run unless you are me.

Additionally, when you run the demo, the results of running PMD will be available for the whole world to see, as well as linked off of the PMD homepage for a period of time. If you don't want this, don't submit to the demo.
